name: A Dark World
description:
This game is an entry for the 8 Bits to Infinity Platformer week.

Use a gamepad or keyboard to control the character through the dark. Use wall jumps to reach high places. Collect enough light to light up the world. Be aware of the enemies because they will steal your light. Once your light completely faded you have lost.

chilibonbon: Art, Music and Programming
svenpl: Programming

Sound Effects are taken from OpenGameArt
